thread.title: A new Alexis Sanchez deal for Arsenal will depend on one thing
thread.title_full: A new Alexis Sanchez deal for Arsenal will depend on one thing

author: James
title: A new Alexis Sanchez deal for Arsenal will depend on one thing
text:
A new Alexis Sanchez deal for Arsenal will depend on one thing   Sanchez has one condition 
Alexis Sanchez’s contract renewal will depend on one thing, according to Goal. The Chilean has been stalling on an extension and it’s causing Gooners to sweat. Hearing his condition for renewal won’t ease their worries. 
He’s going to wait until the end of the season before deciding. His decision will depend on where they finish in the league. Having lost two games on the bounce, Arsenal are struggling to cement their place in the top four. 
Arsenal are down to fourth in the Premier League after losing 3-1 at Chelsea on Saturday. They’re one point ahead of Liverpool and two in front of Manchester United. They face Bayern Munich in the Champions League round of 16. 
PSG target Alexis Sanchez will wait to see Arsenal’s final league position before deciding to extend his contract, according to @Tanziloic . 
— Get French Football (@GFFN) February 6, 2017 Alongside Alexis Sanchez, PSG are pursuing Manchester City’s Sergio Agüero, have been in contact since October, according to @Tanziloic . 
— Get French Football (@GFFN) February 6, 2017 PSG interest 
Paris Saint-Germain are one of the leading clubs tempting Sanchez to consider pastures new. If Arsenal had to sell, they would prefer to do so to a foreign rival. PSG are also chasing Manchester City forward Sergio Aguero. 
Sanchez is one of the leading scorers in the Premier League with 15 goals. Loading tags...
